channel.title: Abrasive Materials & Compounds on eQualle Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abrasive Materials & Compounds on eQualle Blog

item.title: When To Choose Ceramic Over Sic
item.description: Learn when ceramic abrasives outperform silicon carbide sandpaper for metals, composites, and coatings, with actionable workflows and pro surface-prep tips.

item.title: Sic Versus Aluminum Oxide Differences
item.description: Compare silicon carbide sandpaper and aluminum oxide to choose the right abrasive for wood, metal, and paint. Clear, practical tips for better finishes.
